body_html:
It is vgg19 with fully connected head. Nothing unusual. Works fine on GPU. Will try again. Maybe I installed mkldnn after. can't remember. When will this be included in the binary. Takes hours to compile.
…
On 30 July 2018 at 17:16, Soumith Chintala ***@***.***> wrote: @simonm3 <https://github.com/simonm3> that is not normal behavior at all, esp. if you compiled from source with MKLDNN (you have to install MKLDNN first, and compile PyTorch -- make sure PyTorch detected MKLDNN). What kind of model are you running? — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. body:
It is vgg19 with fully connected head. Nothing unusual. Works fine on GPU.
Will try again. Maybe I installed mkldnn after. can't remember.

When will this be included in the binary. Takes hours to compile.

On 30 July 2018 at 17:16, Soumith Chintala <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> @simonm3 <https://github.com/simonm3> that is not normal behavior at all,
> esp. if you compiled from source with MKLDNN (you have to install MKLDNN
> first, and compile PyTorch -- make sure PyTorch detected MKLDNN).
> What kind of model are you running?
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
